explains: adv. 显著地，明显地；引人注目地

sentences.en: The runners have noticeably quickened their pace.
sentences.cn: 赛跑者明显加快了脚步。

sentences.en: Marks were noticeably higher for girls than for boys.
sentences.cn: 女孩子的分数明显地高于男孩子。

sentences.en: Standards of living were deteriorating rather noticeably.
sentences.cn: 生活水平相当明显地下降了。
